message.content:
cs.IR, cs.DL, cs.SI, cs.LG, cs.DB 

The paper discusses the problem of citation recommendation, which is related to information retrieval (cs.IR) and data mining (cs.DL). The use of author, venue, and keyword information suggests a focus on social networks and information systems (cs.SI). The analysis of the degrees of cited papers in the subgraph and the power law distribution suggest a focus on graph theory and network analysis (cs.LG). Finally, the use of fast local approximation for combined methods suggests a focus on database systems (cs.DB).
